articles.title: Glencore may take over Aughinish Alumina from Russian parent - The Irish Times
articles.description: European sanctions spur talks on separating Aughinish from Rusal
articles.content:
Talks on the separation of Aughinish Alumina from its Russian parent have zeroed in on a deal with Glencore of Switzerland, the global metals trader that previously owned the Co Limerick business.

articles.title: Google joins Samsung in working with iFixit on a self-repair program - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with DIY repair specialists iFixit to offer spare parts for its devices. Pixel smartphone parts like batteries, displays, and cameras, will be available to purchase in the US, Canada, Australia, the UK, and Europe.
articles.content:

articles.title: A Surprise Cave Finding Has Once Again Upended Our Story of Humans Leaving Africa - ScienceAlert
